# S-2 Equipment [color=#008000]Green[/color]: - Security does not have to wear body armour or helmets. The officerâ€™s lethal sidearm will always be permitted. - Security is not permitted to open carry longarms. - Security is not permitted to equip heavy armour. - Security must not openly carry lethal weapons. - Personnel searches are allowed provided that the officer has reasonable suspicion of wrongdoing.
[color=#1e90ff]Blue[/color]: - Security is advised to wear body armour. - Security Officers are required to carry their assigned lethal sidearm. - Security Officers must be easily identifiable by members of the crew. - Security may be equipped with heavy armour and longarms provided there is a valid reason.
[color=#cd7f32]Bronze[/color]: - Security is advised to wear body armour. - Security Officers are required to carry their assigned lethal sidearm. - Security Officers must be easily identifiable by members of the crew. - Security may be equipped with heavy armour and longarms. - In order to conduct a search on personnel or a department, proper forms must be filled and signed by the CO or Department Head. Forms must not be signed without reasonable suspicion. Central Command must be notified of department searches. - Security may enter, or be let into any area with suspected hostile lifeforms.
[color=#ffbf00]Amber[/color]: - Security is advised to be equipped with longarms and heavy armour. - Security Officers are required to carry their assigned lethal sidearm. - Security Officers must be easily identifiable by members of the crew and must not wear any clothing that may cause confusion. - Security must wear body armour, may wear their helmet.
[color=#ff0000]Red[/color]: - Full armoury access to all officers. - Security must wear body armour, may wear their helmet. - Security must carry their lethal sidearm. - Security is advised to equip heavy armour and longarms. - Security Officers must be easily identifiable by members of the crew and must not wear any clothing that may cause confusion. - Security is permitted to have elevated access permissions. - All Officers are allowed to enter and search any area. - Random searches are permitted.
[color=#8b0000]Delta[/color]: - Security must facilitate the evacuation of the station. - If the crew is under threat during evacuation, Security must cover a retreat. - If evacuation is unable to be reached, Security must regain control of the station. - Full armoury access to all officers. - Security must wear body armour, may wear their helmet. - Security must carry their lethal sidearm. - Security is advised to equip heavy armour and longarms. - Security Officers must be easily identifiable by members of the crew and must not wear any clothing that may cause confusion. - Security is permitted to have elevated access permissions. - All Officers are allowed to enter and search any area. - Random searches are permitted. - If necessary crew is permitted to bear arms as an organised auxiliary force underneath Security. - Armed crew must be tasked under an officer at all times or given strict, clear, orders on positions to hold.
